鋑字的基本解释

鋑
juān
古同“镌”。

鋑
jiān
锥。

鋑
cuān
刀。

鋑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuān］
［《集韻》七丸切，平桓，清。］
刀。
[②]［jiān］
［《集韻》將廉切，平鹽，精。］
锥。
[③]［juān］
［《廣韻》子泉切，平仙，精。］
同“鐫1”。

鋑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鋑； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1307第11
【廣韻】古文鐫字。註詳十三畫。　又【集韻】七丸切，音㸑。【玉篇】刀也。　又將廉切，音尖。錐也。或作?。

鋑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鋑字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yu
juān
The ancient same "engraving".
Yu
jiān
Cone.
Yu
cuān
Knife.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuān]
["Jiyun" seven pills cut, flat huan, clear. ]
Knife.
[②]［jiān］
["Jiyun" cuts Lian, flat salt, fine. ]
Cone.
[③] [juān]
["Guangyun" Ziquan cut, flat fairy, fine. ]
Same as "镌1".
Yu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鋑; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1307 No. 11
[Guangyun] Ancient Chinese characters. Note 13 pictures in detail.　[Jiyun] Shimanu cut, sound 㸑. [Jade articles] The sword is also.　 Cut Lian again, the sound tip. Cone also. Or for?.
Yu

Name meaning
Nothing.
cuān, jiān, juān
to engrave or carve, as a block for printing
